channel.title: How do I?
channel.description:
Hello im working on my first server ever and I nd some help please.
1) when you log on the first time ever how do you make the character interface pop up just that first time so you can choose your look?
2) There is a tutorial out there on fixing beards for hoods and d meds but will that fid beards when wearing no helm/hood?
3) if not how can I getworking beards?
Thankyou a million I really appreciate it.

item.title: How do I?
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

Hello im working on my first server ever and I nd some help please.

  1. when you log on the first time ever how do you make the character interface pop up just that first time so you can choose your look?

  2. There is a tutorial out there on fixing beards for hoods and d meds but will that fid beards when wearing no helm/hood?
